name: Instagram Post Scheduler
description: A web app to schedule and post photos to Instagram.

NODE_ENV.description: Node JS environment. Can be 'development' or 'production'.

IG_USERNAME.description: The username your Instagram account is associated with.

IG_PROXY.description: Add your proxy here if you want to use one (suggested, otherwise you will make Instagram angry by logging in from dynamic IP addresses). Format should be: 'http://username:pass@ip:port'. Important: It must be 'http' and not 'https' or you will receive an error. For more info: https://stackoverflow.com/a/55226647/10706839

MONGODB_URI.description: Your MongoDB URL. If you don't have one follow the instructions here to create one, then paste it here: https://developer.mongodb.com/how-to/use-atlas-on-heroku/
